pageProps.content:
At Africa Unwind, we custom-design luxury holidays to Africa – so each itinerary is tailored to perfection to suit each client’s individual needs.

However, we thought we’ll share some of our favourite trips with you so that you can get a better idea of what a bespoke Africa Unwind vacation looks like.

Our trips are categorized as follow: Charming, Stylish & Exclusive.

Our Charming Trips offer superb value for money - without compromising on the experience, while our Stylish Trips are ideal for the luxury traveller who prefer stylish interiors & fantastic experiences. The Crème de la Crème at Africa Unwind is our Exclusive Trips that are best suited for the discerning traveller who requires high-end lodges, exclusivity & world-class service.

Before we can create a suggested itinerary for you, we’ll need an estimate budget - the starting place from which we plan all vacations.

Please journey with us as we share some of our favourite trips below. What are you waiting for?

RATE

USD $ 6,000 – USD $ 12,000 per person

subfolders.title: Botswana Bliss
subfolders.description: Experience the best of Botswana & Vic Falls • Stay in luxury tents • Enjoy both land & water-based safari activities • See the Okavango Delta from a bird’s eye view • Go on game drives, guided walks, boating & mokoro safaris • Witness the majestic Victoria Falls

subfolders.title: Limelight On Africa
subfolders.description: Experience a boutique-style African holiday • See iconic Table Mountain & Cape Town’s hot spots • Savour delicious farm-to-table cuisine & South Africa’s best wines • Stay in luxury tents on safari • Enjoy thrilling land & water-based wildlife encounters • Search for nocturnal animals with a spotlight

subfolders.title: Swanky Zimbabwe
subfolders.description: Experience Zimbabwe’s best regions • Enjoy spectacular views over the Zambezi River • Witness the majestic Vic Falls • Go on game drives, guided walks, canoe trips, boat safaris & fishing expeditions • Experience luxury at its best – private pool, outdoor shower & copper bath • Stay in stylish safari tents

subfolders.title: South Africa In Style
subfolders.description: Experience the best of South African luxury • Enjoy uninterrupted ocean views & world-class service • Taste fine dining cuisine & award-winning wines • Sleep in style – from an ocean-front retreat to a luxury safari tent • Spend the night in a luxury treehouse • Encounter Africa’s Big 5 from an open 4x4 jeep

subfolders.title: Tempting Tanzania
subfolders.description: Witness the Great Wildebeest Migration (July – October) • Enjoy excellent Big 5 wildlife viewing year-round • Spot the iconic tree-climbing lions at TarangireGo on open 4x4 day & night drives – searching for nocturnal animals • Enjoy dramatic landscapes & all-day game viewing in the crater • Cycle to a nearby Masai village & meet the locals

subfolders.title: Fun For Families
subfolders.description: Enjoy views over Cape Town’s iconic Waterfront • Explore Cape Town’s highlights – Table Mountain & penguins at Boulders beach • Stay in a private villa while on safari – dedicated ranger, tracker & butler • See Africa’s famous Big 5 • Experience sea-facing suites & villas on a private beach • Enjoy a wide range of land & water-based island activities (& a Kids Club)
